messages.title: GOOD JOBS AND PROPER SUPPORT
messages.content: It's a scandal that 1.5 million working people live in poverty, and more people than ever rely on food banks. Labour will redistribute wealth from the privileged few to the many. We will immediately introduce a real Living Wage of £10 per hour, ban zero hours contracts and abolish Universal Credit which has caused untold hardship in Nottingham.

messages.title: A GREEN NEW DEAL FOR NOTTINGHAM
messages.content: Labour's Green Industrial Revolution will tackle the climate crisis and the crisis of inequality at once, creating one million climate jobs and investing in green innovation. By taking energy into public ownership, we will end fuel poverty and transition to clean energy.

messages.title: A FINAL SAY ON BREXIT
messages.content: For too long, Brexit has divided our country, causing economic chaos and anxiety. We will put the Brexit to bed in 6 months by giving you the final say. In that referendum, I will back Remain.

messages.title: FULLY COSTED
messages.content: We know that austerity is a political choice, not an economic necessity. Labour's economic plans are bold, transformative and affordable. We will fund them by increasing income tax on the top 5% of earners and making sure corporations pay their fair share. No one earning under £80,000 a year will pay a penny more.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduction of a real Living Wage of £10 per hour, ban on zero hours contracts, and abolition of Universal Credit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A GREEN NEW DEAL FOR NOTTINGHAM
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tackling the climate crisis by creating one million climate jobs, investing in green innovation, and taking energy into public ownership.
Holding a referendum and supporting Remain to end the economic chaos and anxiety caused by Brexit.
Funding economic plans by increasing income tax on the top 5% of earners and ensuring corporations pay their fair share, without affecting those earning under £80,000.

leaflet.personalStatement: This is a once-in-a-generation opportunity to create an irreversible shift in wealth and power. I hope you will join me in building a future that's fair for everyone.

quotes.text: This is a once-in-a-generation opportunity to create an irreversible shift in wealth and power. I hope you will join me in building a future that's fair for everyone.

images.caption: I joined hundreds of students and workers at Nottingham's Earth Strike. Only bold actions like a Green Industrial Revolution can stop the climate emergency.
